messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] violence/guns in houses
messages.msgSnippet: Juli, I totally agree with your stance on this.  I don t want my kids playing at homes with guns, either, and the situation you describe does sound like a
messages.messageBody:
Juli, I totally agree with your stance on this. I don't want my kids
playing at homes with guns, either, and the situation you describe does sound
like a potential danger. My husband used to think it might make people think
weirdly of us for me to ask if they have any guns before I think of my kids
going there but I figure that the people we would like our kids to be around
won't mind and may even feel good about us asking because they may have
similar concerns.

Lucy
